participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Driven and optimistic, Emily embodies resilience and determination.
participant_1.background: i'm a cancer survivor. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater. my parents were both very athletic.

participant_2.name: Mohamed
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, Mohamed expresses himself through dance and values freedom.
participant_2.background: my aunt helped me escape when i was of. i like to dance. now i live in the united states. i was born in somalia.
